headline: Another company run into the ground by ACVE
pros: Effectively out of business. Currently operated as a shell company out of a P.O. Box. As CEO, Mr. Anthonie Cornelis Van Ekris ran the previous company, Balfour Maclaine International, Ltd., into the ground too and did no better with Balmac International as CEO.
cons: Effectively out of business in 2009 when it's last division, BMIL International merged with BRR Technologies to form a new entity as BMIL Technologies in North Carolina.
